title: 5 Best Black Friday MacBook Deals Still Available
content:
Black Friday is over but deals on the MacBook Pro and MacBook Air are still plentiful this weekend, with up to $250 select models.

Note: MacRumors is an affiliate partner with some of these vendors. When you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment, which helps us keep the site running.

Best MacBook Deals


  • 13-inch M1 MacBook Air for $749.99 at Amazon ($249 off)

  • 15-inch M2 MacBook Air for $1,049.00 at Amazon ($250 off)

  • 14-inch M3 MacBook Pro for $1,449.00 at Amazon ($150 off)

  • 16-inch M3 Pro MacBook Pro for $2,299.00 at Amazon ($200 off)


Best Black Friday Deals


  • The Best Black Friday Apple Deals

  • The Best Black Friday AirPods Deals

  • The Best Black Friday iPhone Deals

  • The Best Black Friday iPad Deals

  • The Best Black Friday HomePod Deals

  • The Best Black Friday Apple Watch Deals

  • The Best Black Friday MacBook Deals


14-Inch M3 MacBook Pro


Starting with the 512GB M3 14-inch MacBook Pro, you can get this computer for $1,449.00 at Amazon, down from $1,599.00. This is a solid second-best price.

$150 OFF
14-inch MacBook Pro (M3, 512GB) for $1,449.00

$200 OFF
14-inch MacBook Pro (M3 Pro, 1TB) for $2,199.00


16-Inch M3 MacBook Pro


You can get the 512GB M3 Pro 16-inch MacBook Pro for $2,299.00 at Amazon, down from $2,499.00. Similar to the 14-inch models, this is another second-best price.

$200 OFF
16-inch MacBook Pro (M3 Pro, 18GB RAM, 512GB) for $2,299.00

$250 OFF
16-inch MacBook Pro (M3 Pro, 36GB RAM, 512GB) for $2,649.00

15-Inch M2 MacBook Air


Amazon has the 15-inch M2 MacBook Air (256GB) for the low price of 1,049.00, down from $1,299.00.

$250 OFF
15-inch M2 MacBook Air (256GB) for $1,049.00

$250 OFF
15-inch M2 MacBook Air (512GB) for $1,249.00

13-Inch M2 MacBook Air


At Best Buy, you can get the 256GB 13-inch M2 MacBook Air for $899.00, down from $1,099.00. This deal is only available for My Best Buy Plus/Total members, and it's an all-time low price. You'll find a similar record low deal on the 512GB model too.

$200 OFF
13-inch M2 MacBook Air (256GB) for $899.00

13-Inch M1 MacBook Air


The M1 MacBook Air has returned to its steep discounted price of $749.99 for the 256GB model, down from $999.00. This is a great deal and perfect computer for anyone who needs an Apple notebook for simple email and internet browsing.

$249 OFF
M1 MacBook Air (256GB) for $749.99


You can find all the Apple Black Friday Deals currently available in our dedicated post. For everything else, we're keeping track of all of the season's best Apple-related deals in our Black Friday roundup, so be sure to check back throughout the month for an updated list of all the most notable discounts you'll find for Black Friday 2023.
